programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Lorna Dunkley brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: ABC News Day
programme.desc: As every story unfolds, catch each breaking moment and stay up to date. Lorna Dunkley brings you the latest news, interviews, analysis and original reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News through the day. We have reporters in more places, to tell you what's happening and why it matters. Lorna Dunkley brings you the latest news and information.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: ABC News Hour
programme.desc: Stay in the know with Australia's trusted news source. From your neighbourhood, across the country and around the world, ABC News bring you the day's top stories and latest news, all verified. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: The latest breaking news and a comprehensive roundup of the day's best stories from across Australia's states and regions. With reporters in more places ABC News tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: The home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the big stories from across Australia and around the globe. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and all the news you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Stateline
programme.desc: The life-or-death role of Auslan interpreters in Australia's hospitals, a Top End town taking a chance on licenced liquor to stamp out black market booze plus the community breathing new life into a beloved small-town cinema.
